Berwyn.La Vergne station:
La Vergne is one of three stations on Metra's BNSF Railway Line located in Berwyn, Illinois. The station is 9 miles (14 km) away from Union Station, the eastern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, La Vergne is in zone B.


== Bus connections ==
